the Negro self-image ...his morale, if you wish.
BORDERS: Oh, yes. This decision h s done a tremendous amount
GOOD. It HAS AGITATED THE PUBLIC MIND, AND ALL OF US
ARE THINKING MORE CLEARLY WITH REFERENCE TO SEGREGA¬
